definition: clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role

sentences.english: Circulated air design keeps shower area clean in non-shower state.
sentences.chinese: 循环风设计，保证非吹淋状态下风淋区内的洁净度。

sentences.english: And if it spread much abroad in the skin, then the priest shall pronounce him unclean: it is a plague.
sentences.chinese: 若在皮上发散开了，祭司就要定他为不洁净，是灾病。

sentences.english: It shall be as white as snow By Your blood and bitter passion.
sentences.chinese: 却被你十字架所流宝血洁净，洁白如雪。

sentences.english: Objector To evaluate the value of laminar flow in the treatment of bums.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索层流洁净技术治疗大面积烧伤的价值。

sentences.english: That He might sanctify her, cleansing her by the washing of the water in the word.
sentences.chinese: 好圣化召会，借着话中之水的洗涤洁净召会。

sentences.english: Keep the environment clean while enjoying beautiful sceneries.
sentences.chinese: 欣赏美丽的风景保持洁净的环境。

sentences.english: The existing in-grid power pricing policies are lack of protection measures for desulfurized and clean power supply.
sentences.chinese: 现行竟价上网政策缺乏对脱硫洁净电量的保护措施。

sentences.english: And then having Him chasten and correct you as His child.
sentences.chinese: 然后让神来象对儿女一样洁净你，管教你。

sentences.english: and offer it on the altar, together with the grain offering, and make atonement for him, and he will be clean.
sentences.chinese: 把燔祭和素祭献在坛上为他赎罪，他就洁净了。

sentences.english: He burned the bones of the priests on their altars, and so he purged Judah and Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 将他们祭司的骸骨烧在坛上，洁净了犹大和耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: But anything that does not have fins and scales you may not eat; for you it is unclean.
sentences.chinese: 凡无翅无鳞的都不可吃，是与你们不洁净。

sentences.english: Oyster requires clean water to produce good pearls.
sentences.chinese: 珠蚌需要洁净的水来生产优质珍珠。

sentences.english: We have been washed and purified by his saving death!
sentences.chinese: 他救赎的死已经洗清了我们，洁净了我们。

sentences.english: In everything you demonstrated yourselves to be pure in the matter.
sentences.chinese: 在这一切事上你们都表明自己是洁净的。

sentences.english: All the products are according with the vacuum and cleaning level.
sentences.chinese: 全品实行符合真空和洁净级别的清洗。

sentences.english: Inside heating surface of tube is clean.
sentences.chinese: 受热面管子内表面洁净无垢。

definition: untainted by even a speck of dust (idiom); selfless and incorruptible/spotless
to cleanse oneself/to sanctify oneself/self-cleaning (spark plug, oven etc)
see 一塵不染|一尘不染[yi1 chen2 bu4 ran3]
